experience.title: JUNIOR ENGINEER - PLANNING
experience.description: 	Plan and execute the project in a safe and timely manner as per schedule.	Study the 3D assembly as well 2D detail drawings issued by the design team.	Provide guidance to trainees and manufacturing teams.	Participate in design review meetings.	 Daily CNC load planning, study drawings and prepare MFG process.	 Prepare control chart with target dates.	 Decide tools for P1, P2, P3, Review with MFG team and feeding.	Micro schedule preparation and schedule update.	 Preparation of actuals (MFG, TRYOUT, CNC), as per monthly plan.	 Detail drawing vendorisation (small/minute materials).	 Progress photo updating and send reports to the customer every week.	 Preparation of wire cut list and segregation of heat treatment jobs in ordered items.	 Preparation of CNC operation sheets for both inhouse and outsourced jobs.	Checking the BOM data from output and prepare BOM summary.	 Daily update of IML and after inspection send it to the manufacturing department.	Also, send job to CMM for zero stock material.	 Take initiatives and ensure to receive all die parts on time upon product completion.
experience.description_html:
 Plan and execute the project in a safe and timely manner as per schedule.
 Study the 3D assembly as well 2D detail drawings issued by the design team.
 Provide guidance to trainees and manufacturing teams.
 Participate in design review meetings.
 Daily CNC load planning, study drawings and prepare MFG process.
 Prepare control chart with target dates.
 Decide tools for P1, P2, P3, Review with MFG team and feeding.
 Micro schedule preparation and schedule update.
 Preparation of actuals (MFG, TRYOUT, CNC), as per monthly plan.
 Detail drawing vendorisation (small/minute materials).
 Progress photo updating and send reports to the customer every week.
 Preparation of wire cut list and segregation of heat treatment jobs in ordered items.
 Preparation of CNC operation sheets for both inhouse and outsourced jobs.
 Checking the BOM data from output and prepare BOM summary.
 Daily update of IML and after inspection send it to the manufacturing department.
 Also, send job to CMM for zero stock material.
 Take initiatives and ensure to receive all die parts on time upon product completion.

experience.title: NEEM TRAINEE
experience.description: 	Follow company standards like, Continuous Improvement Process and Bosch Production System.	Use of industrial safety standards in day-to-day work.  	Maintaining a focus on quality.	Fault finding and trouble shooting skills.	Provide guidance to my team members help them comprehend the scope of the job.	Provide guidance to bench operator in the determination of operating a machine, while preparing to install the Keyence digital probe.  	Inspect, operate, and test machinery and equipment to diagnose machine malfunctions	Using advance digital measuring instruments to obtain micro level precision.	Root cause analysis / why-why analysis 	Supervise and study on each digital probe and go through the risk analysis of that probe.	Manage the observation timing in each shift, interacting with line foremen and respective bench operator and note each value.	Prepare minutes of meeting with my project team.	Propose action for potential and recent customer complaints.	Co-ordinate with Associates and Project Manager and resolve problems on time.
experience.description_html:
 Follow company standards like, Continuous Improvement Process and Bosch Production System.
 Use of industrial safety standards in day-to-day work.
 Maintaining a focus on quality.
 Fault finding and trouble shooting skills.
 Provide guidance to my team members help them comprehend the scope of the job.
 Provide guidance to bench operator in the determination of operating a machine, while preparing to install the Keyence digital probe.
 Inspect, operate, and test machinery and equipment to diagnose machine malfunctions
 Using advance digital measuring instruments to obtain micro level precision.
 Root cause analysis / why-why analysis
 Supervise and study on each digital probe and go through the risk analysis of that probe.
 Manage the observation timing in each shift, interacting with line foremen and respective bench operator and note each value.
 Prepare minutes of meeting with my project team.
 Propose action for potential and recent customer complaints.
 Co-ordinate with Associates and Project Manager and resolve problems on time.

positions.subtitle: MVP Group International, Inc
positions.description: In this role, I report to the CEO and work closely with the Executive Management Team in defining and executing business strategy for the Manipal Group's Home Fragrance business. Specific responsibilities include:- Enabling implementation of business strategy by liaising with function heads and various program leaders.- Ensuring that strategic initiatives maintain momentum, are tracked and followed-up to completion. - Identification of leading indicators affecting business performance in near term and long term. Partnering with the functional heads in analyzing the trends and coordinating development of action plan.- Ensuring cross-functional accountability for execution against objectives, identify critical issues and facilitate discussion in cross-functional forums to drive systemic resolution of issues.- Leading and executing special projects for CEO- Coordinating CEO reviews and participating in organizational reviews with senior management.- Be a thought partner to the Executive Management Team in analysing industry trends, competitive actions and regulatory environment, and participate in defining company's response to external influences.
positions.title: Strategic Assistant to the CEO
positions.description_html:
In this role, I report to the CEO and work closely with the Executive Management Team in defining and executing business strategy for the Manipal Group's Home Fragrance business.

Specific responsibilities include:
- Enabling implementation of business strategy by liaising with function heads and various program leaders.
- Ensuring that strategic initiatives maintain momentum, are tracked and followed-up to completion.
- Identification of leading indicators affecting business performance in near term and long term. Partnering with the functional heads in analyzing the trends and coordinating development of action plan.
- Ensuring cross-functional accountability for execution against objectives, identify critical issues and facilitate discussion in cross-functional forums to drive systemic resolution of issues.
- Leading and executing special projects for CEO
- Coordinating CEO reviews and participating in organizational reviews with senior management.
- Be a thought partner to the Executive Management Team in analysing industry trends, competitive actions and regulatory environment, and participate in defining company's response to external influences.

recommendations: Muralikrishna Parna “Vinod has the distinct ability to listen and navigate well thru the corporate relationships, to get things done which helped me to be successful as well. Vinod not only has a strategic mind but also is detailed when necessary. He surely expresses his opinion clearly and objectively and has matured over a period of time in managing his emotions very well. His positive attitude to adopt new protocols has a positive influence on others. He is humble to accept mistakes, which makes him more human and liked by the team. He will always be an asset to any team he is part of. ”

Trond Svidal “Commitment is a word that naturally comes to mind when I think about Vinod Kulkarni. I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Vinod since 2013 when he was appointed Manager for the Crop Care Design Analysis Team at John Deere Technology Center India. Above all, I was impressed with Vinod’s ability to inspire and develop a highly engaged team, his natural ability to build strong relationships with all stakeholders across the Enterprise (US, Mexico, Brazil and India), his honesty and his dedication to delivering business results. Vinod would be a true asset for any positions requiring strong team leader skills in a global environment, and strategic thinking to align the team to the long term goals of the business. He comes with my heartfelt recommendation.”

name: Gauri Jaiswal

Eager to expand my skill set and take on new challenges, I am looking to contribute to the field of Human Resources while continuing to grow in my career. Open to new opportunities, let's connect!

name: T.R.Nagendra Rao
about: A customer-centric leader with a passion for growing sales through everlasting relationships with customers. Mr. Rao has been part of Manipal Technologies Limited's (MTL) transformational journey for the last 33 years and has contributed to the company's strategy and exponential business growth. Currently, he is heading the Sales and Integrated Account Management department. Being passionate about delivering customer experience, Mr. Rao introduced the integrated account management function in 2021. Today, he leads a team of relationship managers and delivers value for premium customers by identifying problems, offering creative solutions, and helping them achieve their digital transformational goals. Currently, he is leading all strategic accounts for MTL and its subsidiary companies. Before this, Mr. Rao was leading the sales & marketing department. With his customer engagement and insight into industry developments, he helped the company move into data printing which helped to grow the secure solutions business. He played a key role in the recharge vouchers business helping the telecom companies to take the pre-paid mobile to the masses. Mr. Rao played a critical role in expanding the book business and aiding the company to become the largest book printing company in India, catering to all major publishers. Mr. Rao played a key role in expanding the cards business in India. His strong customer relationships helped in identifying the opportunities in plastic cards. Mr. Rao holds a B.E degree in Mechanical Engineering from Karnataka University, Dharwad. He is an active participant in industry forums and events and started the initiative for MTL to participate in international events. In his leisure time, Mr. Rao enjoys reading books.

current_company.name: Manipal Technologies Limited
current_company.title: Executive Vice President and Chief Growth Officer.

positions.subtitle: Manipal Technologies Limited
positions.title: Executive Vice President and Chief Growth Officer.

positions.subtitle: Manipal Technologies Limited
positions.description: Manipal Technologies Limited (MTL) is part of The Manipal Group, a USD 2 billion multinational conglomerate headquartered in Manipal, Karnataka. Established in 1941 with a vision to create lasting impressions, MTL today is one of the fastest-growing companies transforming billions of lives worldwide.MTL has been a relentless innovator for the last 80 years and today leading player in diverse businesses from fintech, financial inclusion, payments, doorstep banking, enterprise fraud management suite to gold loans, digital media, e-learning, e-commerce, print management, cards, commercial print, secure solutions, and others.MTL has four R&D centers that filed 28 patents for various technology areas and recently rolled out new-age products related to virtual cards, metal cards, and wearable payments.Today, MTL is a trusted partner for leading banks, insurance, telecom, publishing, retail, education, and many global brands across diverse industries for its cutting-edge future-ready products and services. In addition, a partner of choice for many mission-critical solutions for the Government of India.MTL house of brands including MBS, SahiPay, SahiBandhu, CrossFraud, MDS, GetMiClass, MCT Cards, and Breoss continues making a positive impact on society. Every day more than twenty-three million customers use MTLs enterprise platform and every second more than $35 is withdrawn using the SahiPay device. Also, more than four billion+ transactions are protected using our fraud management software based on artificial intelligence.MTL's footprint spread across Germany, Kenya, and Nigeria to support its local customer needs. The trust and support of a large global client base.MTL's success is driven by its strong value system and innovation-led ecosystem. The company provides a safe, respectful, innovative, and vibrant work environment to more than 5000 employees, who are driving the change.
positions.title: Vice President Sales and Marketing
positions.description_html:
Manipal Technologies Limited (MTL) is part of The Manipal Group, a USD 2 billion multinational conglomerate headquartered in Manipal, Karnataka. Established in 1941 with a vision to create lasting impressions, MTL today is one of the fastest-growing companies transforming billions of lives worldwide.



MTL has been a relentless innovator for the last 80 years and today leading player in diverse businesses from fintech, financial inclusion, payments, doorstep banking, enterprise fraud management suite to gold loans, digital media, e-learning, e-commerce, print management, cards, commercial print, secure solutions, and others.
MTL has four R&D centers that filed 28 patents for various technology areas and recently rolled out new-age products related to virtual cards, metal cards, and wearable payments.



Today, MTL is a trusted partner for leading banks, insurance, telecom, publishing, retail, education, and many global brands across diverse industries for its cutting-edge future-ready products and services. In addition, a partner of choice for many mission-critical solutions for the Government of India.



MTL house of brands including MBS, SahiPay, SahiBandhu, CrossFraud, MDS, GetMiClass, MCT Cards, and Breoss continues making a positive impact on society. Every day more than twenty-three million customers use MTLs enterprise platform and every second more than $35 is withdrawn using the SahiPay device. Also, more than four billion+ transactions are protected using our fraud management software based on artificial intelligence.



MTL's footprint spread across Germany, Kenya, and Nigeria to support its local customer needs. The trust and support of a large global client base.
MTL's success is driven by its strong value system and innovation-led ecosystem. The company provides a safe, respectful, innovative, and vibrant work environment to more than 5000 employees, who are driving the change.

experience.title: Human Resources Manager
experience.description: HR Head for South zone (Tamilnadu, Karnataka, AP, Telangana and Kerala), encompassing various functions crucial for organizational success. Key responsibilities include recruitment and hiring, onboarding, employee relations, performance management, compensation and benefits administration, training and development, and ensuring legal compliance. HR professionals act as strategic partners, supporting business objectives by managing the employee lifecycle, fostering a positive work environment, and promoting employee engagement. We also play a vital role in shaping company culture and driving organizational effectiveness. HR roles can vary based on company size, industry, and specific needs, with specializations in areas like talent acquisition or HR business partnering.
experience.description_html: HR Head for South zone (Tamilnadu, Karnataka, AP, Telangana and Kerala), encompassing various functions crucial for organizational success. Key responsibilities include recruitment and hiring, onboarding, employee relations, performance management, compensation and benefits administration, training and development, and ensuring legal compliance. HR professionals act as strategic partners, supporting business objectives by managing the employee lifecycle, fostering a positive work environment, and promoting employee engagement. HR roles can vary based on company size, industry, and specific needs, with specializations in areas like talent acquisition or HR business partnering.

experience.title: Operations Manager

experience.title: Member Relations Specialist
experience.description: Major Key responsibilities include Welcome Calls to the Members with 100% quality with in SL.·​Planning holiday for non-Holiday members with CMH.·​Re verifying the member s details by making pre login calls.·​As a daily process replicate the member s details in the system by referring their MAF and forward it to accounts for the approval.·​Conducting programs for the members and fulfil their needs.·​Taking care of walk in members and resolving their issues as a FTR.·​Also taking care of reservations for the members.·​Member relation department take care of retaining the members.·​Making the work place livelier with lot of performance awards, fun at work and recognitions to the top performers to control attrition.·​Generating Reports to analyses the team wise performance and the circle performance.·​Senior manager will conduct Weekly performance review.
experience.description_html:
Major Key responsibilities include Welcome Calls to the Members with 100% quality with in SL.
·​Planning holiday for non-Holiday members with CMH.
·​Re verifying the member s details by making pre login calls.
·​As a daily process replicate the member s details in the system by referring their MAF and forward it to accounts for the approval.
·​Conducting programs for the members and fulfil their needs.
·​Taking care of walk in members and resolving their issues as a FTR.
·​Also taking care of reservations for the members.
·​Member relation department take care of retaining the members.
·​Making the work place livelier with lot of performance awards, fun at work and recognitions to the top performers to control attrition.
·​Generating Reports to analyses the team wise performance and the circle performance.
·​Senior manager will conduct Weekly performance review.
